item.title: A Beginner’s Guide to RAG: What I Wish Someone Told Me
item.description: A Beginner’s Guide to RAG: What I Wish Someone Told Me In this post, I’ll try to provide a beginners guide to RAG, focusing on what I wish someone told me before trying to build a RAG solution. Attention While I’ve made a strong effort to ensure the information is accurate, I’m far from an expert on the topic, and some details may not be entirely correct. If you notice anything missing or inaccurate, please leave a comment!
